settings.content: Lorenza is a fully responsive, Search Engine Optimized ("SEO") theme for Shopify. Create minimal, asymmetrical layouts, magazine-like lookbooks and artboard-style product collections with a theme designed for hip, boutique retailers just like you. As always, we recommend consulting [our documentation](http://www.fluorescent.co/lorenza) before you begin. If you need any help, feel free to reach out to us at help@fluorescent.co.

settings.info: These settings will override the font settings above. For information on using Typekit, head to [our documentation](http://fluorescent.co/lorenza/).

settings.label: Custom logo width
settings.info: Defines the width of your logo in pixels. To prevent stretching and blurring.

settings.content: Favicons are tiny icons that appear next to your site's title or URL in browser tabs, bookmark menus, and address bars.
Display a simple notification in the header of your store. Great for announcements about sales or shipping.

settings.label: Text
settings.placeholder: Free shipping on all orders over $50.

settings.content: Choose your home page sections and their order. Each section can only be used once.

This sections allows you to set up bold, asymmetrical text and image features on your home page. Asymmetry is difficult to pull off, so you'll want to pay close attention to the orientation, or sizing, of your images. We've listed those orientations below. If you need a hand, check out [our documentation](http://www.fluorescent.co/lorenza).

settings.label: Content
settings.placeholder: Our accessories come sourced from a little place in italy.

settings.label: Content
settings.placeholder: Our accessories come sourced from a little place in Italy.

settings.label: Content
settings.placeholder: Our accessories come sourced from a little place in italy.

settings.content: Allows you to display big, bold half-width images that you can link to individual products or collections. Great for creating a lookbook.

settings.content: Display a single collection's products on the home page.

settings.label: Layout
settings.info: For information on each of these layouts, visit [our documentation](http://fluorescent.co/lorenza).

settings.label: Show background accent
settings.info: Applies only to the slider layout.

settings.label: Products per row
settings.info: Applies only to the grid layout.

settings.content: Display your most recent blog posts. In order for this section to look right, you'll want to create excerpts for each blog post.
Display your latest tweet on the home page. To set up this feature, you'll need to get [your Twitter access token](http://fluorescent.co/lorenza/social-feeds.html#twitter).

settings.label: Access token
settings.info: In order to retrieve your access token, you'll need to head over to [our documentation](http://fluorescent.co/lorenza) on the subject.

settings.content: Display your latest Instagram photos on the home page. To set up this feature, you'll need to get [your Instagram access token](http://fluorescent.co/instagram.html). To read more about this feature, see [our documentation](http://fluorescent.co/lorenza/social-feeds.html#instagram).

settings.label: Variant style
settings.info: Specifies the visual style of the variant selector. View [our documentation](http://fluorescent.co/lorenza) to learn a little more.

settings.content: Allows you to include boilerplate text with every product. We suggest information about shipping and returns.

settings.label: Content
settings.placeholder: We provide free shipping on all orders over $100.

settings.label: Content
settings.placeholder: We honor returns within 7-10 business days.

settings.content: Link your social media accounts and we'll populate your footer with links to where your customers can find you.

settings.label: MailChimp form action URL
settings.info: Your MailChimp form URL inergrates your form with MailChimp.[Find your MailChimp form action URL](https://docs.shopify.com/manual/configuration/store-customization/communicating-with-customers/accounts-and-newsletters/get-a-mailchimp-form-action-url).

settings.content: Encourages users to sign up for your newsletter if it detects that they intend to leave your site.

settings.label: Time upon landing until popup triggers
Text
settings.placeholder: We only send emails once a month, and only about good things.

settings.label: Enable additional cart buttons
settings.info: If your shop accepts payments through third-party checkout systems (e.g., PayPal, ApplePay, etc.), buttons to use these checkout flows will appear on your cart page.

settings.content: Embeds Google Maps on your contact page.

settings.label: iFrame code
settings.info: Learn how to generate your iframe code from [our documentation](http://fluorescent.co/lorenza).
